properties.entry: SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_NICK , MEM_INTRO , MEM_BIRTH , MEM_ADMIN_NY , MEM_STATUS , MEM_LOC_INFO , MEM_PUBLIC_NY , MEM_GOAL_DTN , MEM_CODE_NY , MEM_RPR_CUM , MEM_API_TYPE , MEM_API_TOKEN , MEM_EML FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO =?
